name: Michael & Pekka
description:
Help Michael and Pekka to survive the Siberian harsh winter. Can you save them both?

Controls:

[TAB] Show waypoints

[Shift] Switch between characters

[Space] Action button

[WASD] Movement

Sep. 06/2021:

 - Added some dialogue that hints player what to do next

- Added a timer before the game ends

- Increased the base area where the player can drop resources

- Made fishing easier

 Fixed bugs:

 - Eating at a bonfire now consumes food
